EmailTemplate.description: Email AE receives when a community ticket was created.
EmailTemplate.name: Community Ticket AE Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Portal Ticket #{!Case.CaseNumber} Submitted for {!Case.Accpac_Number__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Account.OwnerFirstName},
This is a notification that {!Case.Contact} submitted Ticket #{!Case.CaseNumber} for {!Account.Shipping_Address__c} via the portal with the following details:
{!Case.Description}
Thank you, Citron Hygiene 800.643.6922
